exact_source: Kali Metals Limited (ASX: KM1) (“Kali” or “the Company”) is pleased to announce it has entered into a binding agreement with Florance Resources Pty Ltd which will see Kali: Acquire tenements E45/6429 and E45/6430 (Refer Figure 1); and Expand its Marble Bar Project and Pilbara footprint by ~19km2
